title: Contact Us
description: Get in touch with Lamb Cottage Caravan Park

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We're here to help with all your enquiries

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content:
**Phone:** 01606 882302
**Email:** info@lambcottage.co.uk
**Address:** Lamb Cottage Caravan Park, Dalefords Lane, Whitegate, Nr. Northwich, Cheshire CW8 2BN
**Hours:** Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday - Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM. Please call during these hours for the quickest response.
